movie.title: Lost Wilderness
movie.description_intro: Four would-be siblings are encouraged by their parents to bond during an outdoor vacation. The four adventurers journey into the wild on their ATVs in search of a family relic. They soon find themselves lost in the woods and ill-equipped to deal with not only the rugged terrain but each other. This is a story of hope and overcoming, full of humor and fun. It's a coming of age tale not only for kids but for parents as well.
movie.description_full: Four would-be siblings are encouraged by their parents to bond during an outdoor vacation. They soon find themselves lost in the woods and ill-equipped to deal with not only the rugged terrain but each other. This is a story of hope and overcoming, full of humor and fun. It's a coming of age tale not only for kids but for parents as well.

movies.title: More to Life
movies.summary: Sean Foster is a second generation hustler with hopes of leaving the street life. This coming-of-age drama is a struggle between chasing your dreams and the fear of the unknown.
movies.description_full: Sean Foster is a second generation hustler with hopes of leaving the street life. This coming-of-age drama is a struggle between chasing your dreams and the fear of the unknown.

movies.title: Imaginaerum
movies.summary: Imaginaerum tells the story of an elderly composer, Tom, who suffers from severe dementia. As he has had the disease for years and has regressed into childhood, he remembers practically nothing from his adult life. His music, friends, all his past including the memory of his daughter are a blur in his fragile mind. All he has left is the imagination of a ten year old boy. As he drifts away into coma, it seems impossible to get back what he has lost. Or is it? The film is a journey between two different dimensions. Tom travels through his imaginary world seeking answers and finding memories, while his daughter, Gem, tries to recover the bond she had once shared with her father in the real world. As they have become more and more distant from each other over the years, and as there's even greater obstacles separating them now Tom's coma and his imminent death Gem's project feels doomed to failure. However, through Tom's darkest secrets, Gem discovers the path she must follow in order to...

movies.title: Black Ops
movies.summary: Special ops squad "Hell's Bastards" are sent to infiltrate a civil war to retrieve intel. The unit soon find themselves trapped on a never-ending stairwell forced to climb or die. To survive, they must revisit their past sins if they ever want to get off.
